text: Tandem Productions was an American movie and television production company. It was created by Norman Lear and Bud Yorkin in 1958. Tandem Productions has made movies like Never Too Late and television shows like All in the Family. ==References== Category:American movie studios Category:American television studios Category:1958 establishments in the United States Category:1986 disestablishments in the United States Category:Defunct companies of the United States
title: Tandem Productions
